document.full_text: holder phil mickelson again zig-zagged his way across augusta national and was relieved to conclude an up-and-down second round on friday in position to mount a masters charge over the weekend.
document.title: phil the thrill primed for weekend charge
lines_and_colors: holder phil mickelson again zig-zagged his way across augusta national and was relieved to conclude an up-and-down second round on friday in position to mount a masters charge over the weekend.
